message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I think it's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this is possible.

Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need at least $11,000 to make this worthwhile.  Let me know if you're willing to come up to that price.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position, but I still believe $10,000 is the most I can realistically pay for this product. I hope we can reach an agreement close to this amount.
